Package com.github.jnstockley

Class Auth

java.lang.Object
com.github.jnstockley.Auth
public class Auth extends Object
Handles reading and writing the all of the users API Keys required for BTTN.
Version:
1.62
Author:
Jack Stockley

    • getAuthKey

      private static String getAuthKey(String clientID, String clientSecret)
      Helper functions which sends the users clientID and clientSecret to the Twitch API to get their Authorization key required to access the Channel Status API
      Parameters:
      clientID - User's Twitch clientID
      clientSecret - User's Twitch clientSecret
      Returns:
      The user's Twitch Authorization key
